code: import React from'react';import'./QRGenerator.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QRActions=_ref=>{let{data,options}=_ref;const handleDownload=async()=>{try{const a=document.createElement('a');a.href=data;a.download="asset-qr-".concat(Date.now(),".").concat(options.format);a.click();}catch(err){console.error('Download error:',err);}};const handleSendToLaser=()=>{alert('QR code sent to laser marking system (feature stub).');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"qr-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:handleDownload,className:"md-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"material-icons-round",children:"download"}),"Download QR Code"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:handleSendToLaser,className:"md-button secondary",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"material-icons-round",children:"flash_on"}),"Send to Laser"]})]});};export default QRActions;
